SEARCH
Package qlang.core.lang

Class Function

java.lang.Object
qlang.core.lang.Function
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class Function extends Object implements Cloneable
This class represents a QLang function, used to create functions in Q.

  • Constructor Details

    • Function

      public Function(Scope parentScope, List<org.antlr.v4.runtime.tree.TerminalNode> params, org.antlr.v4.runtime.tree.ParseTree block)
      Constructs a Function instance with a specified parent scope, parameters, and block.
      Parameters:
      parentScope - The parent scope of the function.
      params - The list of parameters for the function.
      block - The block of code associated with the function.

    • Function

      public Function(Scope parentScope, List<Value> params, org.antlr.v4.runtime.tree.ParseTree block, String s)
      Constructs a Function instance with a specified parent scope, QLang parameters, and block.
      Parameters:
      parentScope - The parent scope of the function.
      params - List of QLang parameters for the function.
      block - The block of code associated with the function.
      s - Unused parameter (not used in the constructor).

    • Function

      public Function(String jblock)
      Constructs a Function instance with a specified Java block.
      Parameters:
      jblock - The Java block code.

  • Method Details

    • execBlock

      public static void execBlock(String java) throws Exception
      Executes the provided Java code block.
      Parameters:
      java - The Java code block.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during execution.

    • printAndExec

      public static void printAndExec(String cmd) throws Exception
      Prints and executes the provided command.
      Parameters:
      cmd - The command to execute.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during execution.

    • call

      public Value call(List<Value> args, Map<String,Function> functions)
      Calls the function with the provided arguments.
      Parameters:
      args - The arguments for the function call.
      functions - Map of available functions.
      Returns:
      The result of the function call.

    • exists

      public boolean exists()
      Checks if the function exists.
      Returns:
      Always returns true.

    • setAsync

      public void setAsync(boolean flag)
      Sets the asynchronous flag for the function.
      Parameters:
      flag - The value to set for the asynchronous flag.

    • clone

      public Function clone()
      Clones the Function instance.
      Returns:
